QuestData.Title: Descent into Darkness
QuestData.Description: The journal was written by a denizen of Silverbrook named Mikhail. It details the arrival of a shadow-worshipping group called the "wolfcult."$B$BThe villagers were reluctant to embrace the cult at first, but sympathizers sprung up gradually among town residents.$B$BUnsettled by this, Mikhail sent his daughter Sasha away from Silverbrook while he attempted to reason with the other villagers.$B$BMikhail's last entry mentions a meeting of local town leaders to discuss unspecified events in Hollowstone Mine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Mikhail's Journal to Lieutenant Dumont in Amberpine Lodge.
QuestData.RewardText: I imagined there would be more to this than just an isolated town of hostiles.$B$BWe have men near Hollowstone Mine, perhaps it would be in our interest to do a little research.
